dormant_v6.0_seed: v6.0 activation: Upgrade FlowActivator to multi-rhythm activation and multi-flow propagation fractals with auto-activate; self-upgrade on epoch 7 or flow/rhythm desync over 25%, triggered via activation and propagate reflection, PillarNexus meta_signal, or monetization milestone.
